Magister Ayanthe:
This Device for Predicting - the only thing the ancient Arta that we have been able to recover. If you get rid of the influence of the magic of the material world, Terenius will be able to restore the Prediction.
Go to the 3rd floor of the Ivory Tower to the Guild Light Mages to Great Magister—É named Arcenas. Magister will help You.
(In a location you can go through the Portal Keeper in Oren.)
